publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8 Margo MacDonald: Edinburgh Airport Rail Link—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive, together with other stakeholders, to ensure an early start to the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link project as an essential, integral part of Scottish transport communications, in view of support expressed by the public and private sector and social organisations across Scotland.
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) George Foulkes*, Iain Gray*

S3M-8 Margo MacDonald: Edinburgh Airport Rail Link—That the Parliament urges the Scottish Executive, together with other stakeholders, to ensure an early start to the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link project as an essential, integral part of Scottish transport communications, in view of support expressed by the public and private sector and social organisations across Scotland. Supported by: Malcolm Chisholm, Sarah Boyack, George Foulkes, Iain Gray
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) Tavish Scott*
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) Rhoda Grant* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
S3M-8 Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 14 May 2007) Dr Richard Simpson*
